alert.note: Alert for Cadiz Basin; San Bernardino County-Upper Colorado River Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 19 at 1:37AM PST until November 20 at 6:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM PST /5 AM MST/ TO 6 PM PST /7 PM MST/ MONDAY... * WHAT...North winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...In Arizona, Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave. In California, Cadiz Basin and San Bernardino County-Upper Colorado River Valley. * WHEN...From 4 AM PST /5 AM MST/ to 6 PM PST /7 PM MST/ Monday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. These winds will create choppy waters and large waves on area lakes. Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution if driving high profile vehicles or motorcycles. Boaters should avoid the open waters or postpone outings until winds subside. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Cadiz Basin; San Bernardino County-Upper Colorado River Valley
